scripts.dev:cdn: cross-env useCdn=true  && yarn downCdn && yarn downIconfront && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.start:cdn: cross-env useCdn=true  && yarn downCdn && yarn downIconfront &&  vue-cli-service serve
scripts.serve:cdn: cross-env useCdn=true  &&  yarn downCdn && yarn downIconfront && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.pure:build: vue-cli-service build && rimraf dist/example dist/assets/css dist/assets/js
scripts.build: yarn swagger && vue-cli-service build --report && cp -r swagger.json dist && cd dist && rimraf manifest.webmanifest && cp -i manifest.json manifest.webmanifest
scripts.build:pure: yarn build && rimraf dist/example dist/assets/css dist/assets/js report.html swagger.json
scripts.build:local: cross-env local=true && yarn build && rimraf dist/example dist/assets/css dist/assets/js report.html swagger.json
scripts.build:cdn: yarn downCdn && yarn downIconfront && cross-env useCdn=true  && vue-cli-service build --report && yarn swagger && cp -r swagger.json dist && cd dist && rimraf manifest.webmanifest && cp -i manifest.json manifest.webmanifest
scripts.build:report: yarn downCdn && yarn downIconfront &&  vue-cli-service build --report && yarn swagger && cp -r swagger.json dist && cd dist && rimraf manifest.webmanifest &&  cp -i manifest.json manifest.webmanifest
scripts.clear:install: npm install -g rimraf && npm run clear && cnpm install
scripts.checkout:main: git checkout master && git  pull origin master && git checkout main &&  git pull origin main &&  rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.use:github: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && npm run copy:config  && git pull origin master &&  yarn changelog:zh && yarn changelog:en && git add . && git cz
scripts.use:github:main: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && npm run copy:config  && git pull origin main &&  yarn changelog:zh && yarn changelog:en && git add . && git cz
scripts.use:gitbit: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r gitbit/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && git pull origin master && yarn changelog:zh && yarn changelog:en  && git add . && git cz
scripts.set:github: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin master && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.set:github:main: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin main && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r  github/* .git && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.set:gitbit: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin master && rimraf gitbit && mkdir gitbit && cp -r gitbit gitbit && if exist gitbit echo 'gitbit'
scripts.copy:config: rimraf src/config/developer.config.js && cp src/config/developer.lock.js src/config/developer.config.js && echo 'copy config done'
scripts.dgiot:install: yarn global add rimraf && rimraf node_modules/.bin && rimraf node_modules/.cache && rimraf node_modules/.yarn-integrity  && rimraf node_modules && rimraf yarn.lock && yarn
